title: Build tips for Lux?
body:
Does anyone have any build tips for my favorite champ {{champion:99}} ? Including Runes and Masteries.

I've been playing Lux a lot lately, and while my build and play with her is decent, I feel it could be better. So I've come to the boards, asking for help with improving my build for my favorite lady of light.

My Match history using Lux:

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-history/NA/36027185?champion=99

replies.body:
Lux is fairly offensive, dealing a lot of damage with quick bursts and low cooldowns. I usually build for at least a bit of mana regen right off (she's a bit of a mana sink), and then start building for as much AP as possible. She's also at range most of the time, so defense shouldn't be a priority most of the time. If you need defense, take items with additional AP.

So, start off buying {{item:3114}} or {{item:3028}} (take chalice for a bit of defense in lane), {{item:3020}} {{item:3285}} next, and finish the {{item:3165}} or {{item:3174}} now. After that, buy what you need (AP, CDR, defense, penetration, etc ) 

That's usually how I build. Might not work for everyone, but this works for me and my play.

She's basically all damage and a Zhonya's if she needs it. Depending on your own play style you might move around how much mana and CDR you buy. However her greatest defenses will always be her own range and positioning.

Mostly I'm looking at {{item:3285}} -> {{item:3020}} -> {{item:3165}} -> {{item:3089}} /{{item:3157}} /{{item:3135}} . However as there are massive new AP item changes coming up, what I'm planning to try is {{item:3285}} {{item:3158}} {{item:3040}} {{item:3089}} {{item:3165}} {{item:3135}} in some order.

I've been picking up Lux a little recently. I like to go max CDR with the highest AP stack I can get. Squishies who don't itemize for magic resist will die instantly to a full Q-E-R combo.

In this order

{{item:3165}} {{item:3158}} {{item:3285}} Luden's second because the extra burst is very strong early on. It also adds extra burst to your ult which helps for sniping kills. Then {{item:3157}} or {{item:3089}} depending on if you need defenses or not. Next {{item:3135}} and then Either Dcap or Zhonyas whichever you didn't get.

{{item:3165}} {{item:3285}} {{item:3157}} {{item:3089}} {{item:3135}} {{item:3158}}

Chalice-Deathcap-Grail/Sorc-Void-Moar CDR - Games don't usually last this long.
Early deathcap increases wave clear to near perfect with e, not to mention the harass improvements.
Lux should, ideally, have max CDR, but aside from the grail second, you don't particularly need to rush it, you should have blue buff in the intervening time before morello's.
To be entirely honest : Lux's early game is NOT that important - Just keep up in farm, roam if necessary, and don't die. It's incredibly rare for a 1k+ damage aoe ult to be outscaled :)
> [{quoted}](name=ZergReap,realm=NA,application-id=WEuoGbmp,discussion-id=XA5fVxcb,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-06-25T03:23:38.333+0000)
>I like to go max CDR with the highest AP stack I can get. 

This is, essentially, the best answer you're going to get on how to build Lux - While morello's does have better early mana regen, i'm a bit of a stick in the mud, and like my established build path.
However, as long as you follow the basic high CDR build with an early damage item, It's really a matter of preference as far as order goes, as she scales like a beast because of full AoE.
